諸法実相: (しょほうじっそう) - concept that all things and phenomena reflect the truth
諸法無我: (しょほうむが) - idea that all things in the universe lack their own unchangeable substances
諸派: (しょは) - various parties or factions; minor parties
諸点: (しょてん) - various points (of discussion); various places; various spots; various matters
諸相: (しょそう) - various aspects or phases
諸聖人の祝日: (しょせいじんのしゅくじつ) - All Saints Day
諸肌: (もろはだ) - both bare shoulders; stripped to the waist
諸肌を脱ぐ: (もろはだをぬぐ) - to strip to one's waist; to go at with might and main
諸肌脱ぎ: (もろはだぬぎ) - stripping to one's waist; being bare from the waist up
諸膚: (もろはだ) - both bare shoulders; stripped to the waist
諸蕃: (しょばん) - foreign lands; clans supposedly descended from foreign lineage (i.e. Chinese or Korean)
諸藩: (しょはん) - various fiefdoms; various domains
諸行: (しょぎょう) - all worldly phenomena/meritorious acts leading to enlightenment; (Jodo school) all practices other than recitation of the nembutsu prayer
諸行無常: (しょぎょうむじょう) - (yoji)  the impermanence of worldly things; All worldly things are transitory
諸説: (しょせつ) - various opinions/various theories; various rumors (rumours)
諸説紛々: (しょせつふんぷん) - (yoji) divergent opinions abound; opinion is divided; there are many rumors afloat
諸説紛紛: (しょせつふんぷん) - (yoji) divergent opinions abound; opinion is divided; there are many rumors afloat
諸諸: (もろもろ) - all kinds of things; various things; large number of people
諸賢: (しょけん) - (all of) you or them; various wise individuals; gentlemen
諸車: (しょしゃ) - vehicles of all types; all vehicles
諸車通行止: (しょしゃつうこうどめ) - (on a sign) Closed to Traffic; No Thoroughfare
諸飾り: (もろかざり) - decorating the alcove of a tea room with a hanging scroll and flowers (in more formal tea ceremonies, during only the first and second half respectively); (orig. meaning) style of decorating a traditional Japanese room (esp. a study) in which incense, a pair of vases and a pair of candlesticks are placed on a table in front of a trio of hanging scrolls
諺: (げん) - Provérbio, provérbio, ditado, aforismo, máxima
諺文: (げんぶん) - (old name for) hangul; the Korean script
諾う: (うべなう) - to agree; to assent; to consent; to obey; to conform
諾する: (だくする) - to consent to; to assent to
諾否: (だくひ) - consent or refusal; yes or no; decision to accept or decline; up or down (vote); assent or dissent; accept or reject
諾約: (だくやく) - consent to an application for a contract
諾足: (だくあし) - trot (as in horse riding)
謀る: (たばかる) - to work out a plan of deception/to scheme/to take in/to dupe/to deceive; to think up a plan/to think over a plan; to discuss/to consult
謀叛: (ぼうはん) - rebellion/uprising/insurrection; (usu. 謀叛) treason
謀大逆: (ぼうたいぎゃく) - plotting to damage the imperial palace or an imperial tomb
謀殺: (ぼうさつ) - premeditated murder; deliberate murder; willful murder; wilful murder
謁す: (えっす) - to have an audience with
謁する: (えっする) - to have an audience with
謁を賜わる: (えつをたまわる) - to be granted an audience
謁見: (ekken) - audience (com um superior, por exemplo, nobreza)
謂: (い) - Reason , what was said, what it means, origin of a story (ou tradição, etc.)
謂う: (ゆう) - to say/to utter/to declare; to name/to call; (言う only) to go (e.g. "the alarm went ping")/to make a noise
謂う所の: (いうところの) - what is called; as it is called; the so-called; known as; so to speak
謂れない: (いわれない) - unjustified; unwarranted; unfounded; baseless; groundless
謂れのない: (いわれのない) - unjustified; unwarranted; unfounded; baseless; groundless
謂れ無い: (いわれない) - unjustified; unwarranted; unfounded; baseless; groundless
謂わば: (いわば) - so to speak; so to call it; as it were
謄写: (とうしゃ) - copy; transcription; mimeograph; photocopy
謄本: (touhon) - cópia autenticada, histórico; cópia oficial do registro de família
謎: (nazo) - enigma, enigma, quebra-cabeça, enigma, mistério; enigmático, misterioso
謎かけ: (なぞかけ) - a particular type of riddle
謎めく: (なぞめく) - to be enigmatic or puzzling; to be wrapped in mystery
謎をかける: (なぞをかける) - to pose a riddle
謎を掛ける: (なぞをかける) - to pose a riddle
謎を解く: (なぞをとく) - to solve a mystery
謎掛け: (なぞかけ) - a particular type of riddle
謎解き: (なぞとき) - solution of a riddle
謗り: (そしり) - slander; libel; disparagement; calumny; vilification
謗る: (そしる) - to slander; to libel; to criticize; to criticise
謙そん: (けんそん) - humble; humility; modesty; being humble
謙る: (へりくだる) - to deprecate oneself and praise the listener; to abase oneself
謙譲の美徳: (けんじょうのびとく) - modest virtue
謙譲語: (けんじょうご) - humble language (e.g. itadaku)
謙譲語１: (けんじょうごいち) - humble language in which the listener (or a third party) is the indirect object of an action (or the recipient of an object, etc.)
謙譲語２: (けんじょうごに) - humble language in which an action or object is not directed toward the listener (or a third party); humble language used as a courtesy
謙譲語Ｉ: (けんじょうごいち) - humble language in which the listener (or a third party) is the indirect object of an action (or the recipient of an object, etc.)
謙譲語ＩＩ: (けんじょうごに) - humble language in which an action or object is not directed toward the listener (or a third party); humble language used as a courtesy
